title:
Is the Marine Corps going to recommission and use Camp Davis in Holly Ridge?  I know that there are various training sites around Holly Ridge that the USMC uses, but I keep hearing rumors that Camp Davis will once again be used by the Corps much like it was used back in the 1940\'s.



thx,
text:
That's a persistent rumor. Here's a previous post at MyReporter.com
that should answer your questions: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3644
